Habit Tracker Module

class src.habit_tracker.HabitTracker(db)[source]

Bases: object

Main class for tracking habits.

This class provides methods for adding, completing, analyzing and deleting habits. It uses a DataPersistence object to interact with the database.

add_habit(name, description, periodicity)[source]

Add a new habit.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – Name of the habit.

  • description (str) – Description of the habit.

  • periodicity (str) – Frequency of the habit (‘daily’ or ‘weekly’).

Returns:

The newly created habit object.

Return type:

Habit

complete_habit(habit_id)[source]

Mark a habit as completed.

Parameters:

habit_id (int) – The ID of the habit to be completed.

Returns:

The completed habit object, or None if not found.

Return type:

Habit

delete_habit(habit_id)[source]

Delete a habit.

Parameters:

habit_id (int) – The ID of the habit to be deleted.

Returns:

The deleted habit object, or None if not found.

Return type:

Habit

get_all_habits()[source]

Get all habits.

Returns:

A list of all Habit objects.

Return type:

list

get_habit_by_id(habit_id)[source]

Get a habit by its ID.

Parameters:

habit_id (int) – The ID of the habit to retrieve.

Returns:

The habit object with the given ID, or None if not found.

Return type:

Habit

get_habits_by_periodicity(periodicity)[source]

Get habits by their periodicity.

Parameters:

periodicity (str) – The periodicity to filter by (‘daily’ or ‘weekly’).

Returns:

A list of Habit objects with the given periodicity.

Return type:

list

get_longest_streak_all_habits()[source]

Get the longest streak across all habits.

Returns:

A tuple containing the longest streak (int) and the corresponding Habit object.

Return type:

tuple

static get_longest_streak_for_habit(habit)[source]

Get the longest streak for a specific habit.

Parameters:

habit (Habit) – The habit to analyze.

Returns:

The longest streak for the given habit.

Return type:

int
